plot: After the accidental death of her daughter, a despondent mother struggles with forgiving the one person responsible - her own sister.
title: Walls of Jericho
plot_es: After the accidental death of her daughter, a despondent mother struggles with forgiving the one person responsible - her own sister.
plot_en: After the accidental death of her daughter, a despondent mother struggles with forgiving the one person responsible - her own sister.
